name: Blocks - fun tile puzzle games
description:
Tap tiles to play!
Blocks is a fun free game.
Relax, classic games revisited.

● Compatibility and support
We're continuously HARD WORKING so that all phones run the game smoothly. Please report any issue you may experience on our facebook page

● Disclaimer
Blocks is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep it away from your kids, children and younger boys and girls
KEEP IN MIND!
Prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Pricing Matrix" determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $ USD
